Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Advisor, William! Can you hear me?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: The University President wants us to regain control of the region, and his manor.

Name: William
Text: It's going to be tough. He's barely given us any units...

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Don't worry, we managed to find something in the budget to get some bases. We can use them to deploy units. Advisor hasn't recieved instructions on how to do this but-

Name: Sally
Text: Don't worry- We'll go through the steps!.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I couldn't ask for a better team, good luck!

Name: Sally
Text: First, place the cursor on an empty base They are the ones with the triangular roofs. Then select it.

Name: Sally
Text: A list of units will be displayed. Units that you can't afford will appear in gray.

Name: Sally
Text: Select a unit you want to deploy. If you don't want to deploy one, you can always cancel.

Name: Sally
Text: Remember, you can't move units you've just deployed on the same turn.

Name: William
Text: To fund our army we'll have to capture more properties here.

Name: Sally
Text: Let's show them how Money is Power!
